Name: Shawy Adventures
About the game: Shawy Adventures is a Retro Action Platformer inspired on the early Game Boy games. Help Shawy with his first adventure, recover the stolen sacred stones and became rich and famous. Game Features: Retro Action Platformer Pixel Art style using a 4-color palette Adaptive and unique soundtrack Kill lots of enemies and three different bosses 15+ areas to explore Find secrets and get your score as high as possible For Windows, Mac and Linux (64bit)
